name: Dots VS Lines
description:
Aim for the highest score in this relaxing and fun block match game.

Blocks are regularly sketched and created near the top of the board - then drop down. Roll the settled blocks of dots or lines to match two or more of the same orientation - then tap to collect points.

You have until a new block cannot be created at the top of the board – and are competing with your own best score, and the global Game Centre Leaderboards.

Have fun playing Dots vs Lines.
